citeinfo.origin: Korea Ocean Research and Development Institute (KORDI), Republic of Korea
citeinfo.title: Buoy Observation Data Provided by Korea Ocean Research and Development Institute (KORDI) in NEAR-GOOS Regional Real Time Data Base (RRTDB)

abstract.p: Buoy observation data provided by Korea Ocean Research and Development Institute (the Republic of Korea ). Data are available from 3 July 1999 in the directory pub/KORDI. Contents of the data are described in the www site of KORDI (http://near-goos.kordi.re.kr).
Within the data, JMA decodes sea temperature and wind data. The decoded sea temperature data are available in the directory pub/subst, and the wind data are in the directory pub/wind, respectively.

Data stations include: Sokcho, Wangdol, Kwangan, Kyobon, Chulwoon, Seocheon, Taean, Incheon, Boksacho, Donongtan, Ieodo, and Banseo. Observed data include: water temperature, wave height, wave potential, wind speed, wind d. air temperature, humidity, and air pressure.

Data sets may be obtained directly from the North-East Asian Regional - Global Ocean Observing System (NEAR-GOOS) Regional Real Time Data Base (RRTDB) at http://goos.kishou.go.jp/ with a user account. First time users must register to gain database access.

descript.purpose: To offer basic data service to NEAR-GOOS and GOOS communities as part of the NEAR-GOOS project.

idinfo.accconst: First time users must register to gain database access.

distinfo.distliab: While every effort has been made to ensure that these data are accurate and reliable within the limits of the current state of the art, NOAA cannot assume liability for any damages caused by any errors or omissions in the data, nor as a result of the failure of the data to function on a particular system. NOAA makes no warranty, expressed or implied, nor does the fact of distribution constitute such a warranty.
